The channel will draw inspiration from Paddy Galloway, Nate Black, 0xSuperPrime, and Film Booth, while maintaining a unique format and brand identity.

The work will not be rushed, but an avatar in my likeness will be used.

• Be an intermediate-level (mid-tier by Western standards) writer. No more, no less.

• Have experience with documentary-style videos that involve research.
• Have a clear understanding of YouTube/TV formats/concepts.
• Have your own YouTube channel.
• Be fluent in English or French, with Spanish as a plus.
• Provide me with your date and place of birth (I connect better with certain zodiac signs).

• Have a profile on a freelance platform.
